class_notes:
Prerequisite: Constitutional Law
Students CANNOT take both LAW 601 and 601A.
course_description: This course is a survey of the free expression clauses of the First Amendment. Doctrines are taught in large measure through problems from the Volokh casebook.
sections: Class Nbr: 2254, Section #: 001, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 2:30-4p, Instructor: T. Arthur, Status: Open
